traits.name: Battlecast
traits.desc: After dealing or taking 10 instances of damage, Battlecast champions deal magic damage to the nearest enemy. If below 50% Health, heal that much instead.

traits.name: Blaster
traits.desc: Every 4th attack, Blasters fire additional attacks at random enemies. These additional attacks can critically hit.

traits.name: Chrono
traits.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed at the start of combat and every few seconds.

traits.name: Cybernetic
traits.desc: Cybernetics holding at least 1 item gain Attack Damage and Health.

traits.name: Dark Star
traits.desc: Whenever an allied champion dies, Dark Stars gain Attack Damage and Ability Power.

stats.2: Demolitionists' abilities Stun enemies for 1.5 seconds. (Once per cast)

traits.name: Infiltrator
traits.desc:
Innate: At the start of combat, Infiltrators move to the enemy's backline.

Infiltrators gain Attack Speed for 6 seconds at the start of combat, refreshed on enemy takedowns.

stats.2:
Mana-Reaver attacks increase Mana Reave.

Mana Reave: Increase max Mana by 30% until the next cast.

stats.3:
Start of combat: 3 random Mech-Pilots merge into a Super-Mech.

The Super-Mech has the Traits of its pilots, 3 random items from among them, and gains 65% of the combined pilot's Health and Attack Damage.

When the Super-Mech dies, the Piots are ejected with 35% of thier max Health.

stats.1: Innate: Upgrades for Mercenaries's abilities have a chance to appear in the shop.
Your team's attacks are converted to magic damage. Your Star Guardians' attacks deal true damage instead.

traits.name: Protector
traits.desc: Whenever a Protector casts their ability, they gain a Shield for 4 seconds.

traits.name: Rebel
traits.desc: At the start of combat for 8 seconds, Rebels gain a Shield and bonus damage for each adjacent Rebel.

traits.name: 8-bit
traits.desc: Keep score of your team's damage dealt. For each high score you beat, 8-bit champions gain Attack Damage.

stats.6: 14% AD and unlock a final high score, that rewards you with a grand prize.

traits.name: Bruiser
traits.desc: Your team gains 100 Health. Bruiser gain bonus maximum Health.

stats.1: Akali is a member of K/DA or True Damage depending on which trait has more fielded champions. She gains a different Ability depending on which form she takes.
The Maestro always attacks at a fixed pace, converting 1% bonus Attack Speed into 0.7% Attack Damage.

traits.name: Country
traits.desc: When your team loses 30% of their Health, a Dreadsteed that empowers your team. Each Country star level increases the Dreadsteed's Health and Attack Damage.

traits.name: Crowd Diver
traits.desc:
After Crowd Divers die, they leap onto the furthest enemy, dealing 300 magic damage. Enemies within 1 hex are Stunned for 1.5 seconds.

They also deal bonus damage, increased by 1% each second.

traits.name: Dazzler
traits.desc: Dazzler' Ability reduce their target's damage by 10% and deal bonus magic damage over 2 seconds.

traits.name: Big Shot
traits.desc: Big Shots gain Attack Damage. which increases for 3 seconds when they use their Ability.

stats.1: Choose a mode that changes the Mixmaster's attacks and Ability!

traits.name: Edgelord
traits.desc: Edgelords gain Attack Speed which doubles when their target drops target drops below 50% Health. Edgelords with 1-hex range also dash through them on their next attack.

traits.name: EDM
traits.desc:
Use the EDM selector item to choose an EDM champion and see the frequency for each.

At the selected champions's frequency, your EDM champions cast the selected Ability with modified effectiveness.

traits.name: Emo
traits.desc: Emo Champions' Ability cost less Mana to cast, and they gain Mana whenever an allied champion dies.

traits.name: Executioner
traits.desc: Executioner Abilities can critically strike and they gain Critical Strike Damage. Their Critical Strike Chance is increased based on their target's missing Health.

stats.2: 5% Crit Damage, Up to 25% Crit Chance
stats.4: 15% Crit Damage, Up to 80% Crit Chance
stats.6: 30% Crit Damage, Up to 160% Crit Chance

traits.name: Mosher
traits.desc:
Moshers gain Attack Speed and Omnivamp, which increases up to 100% based on their missing Health.

Omnivamp: Heal for percentage of damage dealt

traits.name: Disco
traits.desc:
Summon a movable Disco Ball.

Combat start: Allies next to it gain Attack Speed and healing immediately and every 3 seconds.

stats.5: 2 Disco Balls, 12% Attack Speed, 3% max Health

traits.name: Guardian
traits.desc: Once per combat at 50% Health, Guardians shield themselves and their closest ally for a percent of their max Health.

traits.name: Hyperpop
traits.desc: When Hyperpop champions use an Ability, they grant Mana and 4 seconds of Attack Speed to their 2 closest allies.

stats.1: Gain 2/2/8 placeable Spirit Tentacles, based on Illaoi's star level. Tentacles gain Illaoi's bonus Armor and Magic Resist.

traits.name: Jazz
traits.desc: For each active trait (except uniques), your team gains bonus Health and deals bonus damage.

traits.name: K/DA
traits.desc: Your team gains max Health, Ability Power, and Attack Damage if they are in a lighted hex. K/DA champions gain double!

stats.10: +45% max Health, +45 AP & AD, 10 mana per second

traits.name: Pentakill
traits.desc:
Pentakill champions reduce incoming damage by 15% and deal bonus damage. For each champion kill, a Pentakill champion rocks out and increases their damage bonus by 25%.

On the 5th kills, all Pentakill champions rock out and your team gains 50% Attack Speed.

traits.name: Heartsteel
traits.desc: Earn Hearts by killing enemies. Gain even more by losing player combat. Every 4 player combats, convert Hearts into powerful rewards!

stats.10: 18x Hearts, Gain rewards every round and keep 80% of you Hearts!

traits.name: Punk
traits.desc:
Punks gain bonus Health and Attack Damage, which increases by 1% every time you spend gold on a Shop reroll.

After Punks fight in combat, your 1st Shop reroll costs 1 gold and grants 3% bonus instead!

traits.name: Rapidfire
traits.desc:
Your team gains 10% Attack Speed.

Rapidfire champions gain more on every attack, up to 10 stacks.

traits.name: Sentinel
traits.desc: Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist. Sentinels gain double.

traits.name: Spellweaver
traits.desc: Your team gains 15 Ability Power. Spellweavers gain more, plus extra Ability Power whenever a Spellweaver casts an Ability.

traits.name: Superfan
traits.desc: Superfans improve your Headliner!

stats.5:
Item upgrades to radiant

Omnivamp: Heal for percentage of damage dealt

traits.name: True Damage
traits.desc: True Damage champions deal bonus true damage. If they are holding an item, they gain a unique Bling Bonus for their Ability.

stats.1:
If you win player combat, Kayn becomes the Shadow Assassin. If not, he becomes Rhaast. You receive a reward based on his form every time he kills 2 enemy champions.

Shadow Assassin: 3g

Rhaast: 1 player health.

traits.name: Blademaster
traits.desc: Blademasters' attacks have a chance to trigger additional attacks against the current target.

traits.name: Brawler
traits.desc: Brawlers gain Health.

traits.name: Celestial
traits.desc: Your team gains Omnivamp.

traits.name: Mystic
traits.desc: Your team gains Magic Resist.

traits.name: Sorcerer
traits.desc: Your team gains Ability Power.

traits.name: Sniper
traits.desc: Snipers deal increased damage for each hex between themselves and their target.

traits.name: Space Pirate
traits.desc: Whenever a Space Pirate lands a killing blow, there is a chance to drop loot.

traits.name: Star Guardian
traits.desc: Whenever a Star Guardian casts, all other Star Guardians gain Mana.

stats.1: Innate: Starships gain 40 Mana per second, maneuver around the board, and are immune to movement impairing effects, but don't attack.

traits.name: Vanguard
traits.desc: Vanguards gain Armor.
